channel.title: Compiling Model help!
channel.description:
After compiling a model, I viewed it in model viewer. It is too far from the center. Please give some tips. Thank you!
EDIT: It also faces to the left instead of facing you but in physics tab, the model is in the center and facing you. I'm just a beginner in this.

item.title: Compiling Model help!
item.dc:creator: D3lta
item.description:
You’ll most likely get a better answer here.

I had this problem too though, as far as I remember I just placed the model in a new file and compiled it.

Read full topic
